content: pride turtle amigurumi pattern by ambroscrochet every part of the turtle is worked in rounds do not join at the end of each round finished size approximately 9 cm 3 5 inches yarn schachenmayr bravo in whatever colors you prefer - i used 8197 and 8267 as the two shades of brown crochet hook 3 mm you will also need tapestry needle or needle and thread pins scissors toy stuffing 6 mm safety eyes or needle and black thread if you wish to embroider the eyes notes patterns uses us terminology abbreviations and stitches used magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase decrease = decrease fasten_off = f/o back loops only = blo → how to read the pattern round x we are working on round x → x single_crochet increase/decrease * y the instructions between parentheses have to be repeated y times x single_crochet increase/decrease means we will work one single_crochet in each x stitches and then work one increase or one decrease into the next stitch for example 3 single_crochet increase * 6 means work one single_crochet in each of the next three stitches one increase in the fourth stitch repeat six times → x single_crochet increase/decrease work one single_crochet in each of the x stitches then work one increase/decrease in the next stitch if you have any questions you can reach me on instagram @robiambros or on facebook @ambroscrochet make sure to tag me if you post pictures of your finished amigurumi if you need a refresher on some stitches i have a series of tutorials on my igtv where you will also find a series of videos on how to make this amigurumi if you feel like supporting my patterns you can do so through my ko-fi 1 head start with a magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet in the magic_ring 6 round 2 increase * 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet in each stitch 12 round 4 1 single_crochet increase * 6 18 round 5 1 single_crochet in each stitch 18 place safety eyes between rounds 2 and 3 3 stitches apart round 6 1 single_crochet decrease * 6 12 stuff the head round 7 2 single_crochet decrease * 3 9 leave a tail for sewing shell start with a magic_ring round 1 6 single_crochet in the magic_ring 6 round 2 increase * 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase * 6 18 round 4 2 single_crochet increase * 6 24 round 5 3 single_crochet increase * 6 30 round 6 1 single_crochet in each stitch 30 round 7 4 single_crochet increase * 6 36 round 8 1 single_crochet in each stitch 36 change colors - i switched to the darker brown round 9 in blo 4 single_crochet decrease * 6 30 round 10 3 single_crochet decrease * 6 24 round 11 2 single_crochet decrease * 6 18 start stuffing the body round 12 1 single_crochet decrease * 6 12 finish stuffing the body round 13 decrease * 6 6 f/o 2 paws make four start
